ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] Member intro
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, Muriel. I m actually a lurker; I quit EQ two years ago, now... wow.  Didn t realize so much time had passed.  I was an early EQ er and made it through the
ygData.messageBody:
Hi, Muriel.
 
I'm actually a lurker; I quit EQ two years ago, now... wow.  Didn't realize so much time had passed.  I was an early EQ'er and made it through the first expansion pack, and then I went back to college, and decided I could do one or the other... not both.  So I started Diablo 2 and a couple of other shooter-types to have something on which to take out my frustrations.  You would be surprised at where you find women. ;-)  I can frag with the best of 'em!
 
I hesitate to give you advice on how to find a girlfriend for your son.  I assume that you're talking about an online roleplay partner; there are some guilds that are active in roleplaying and someone might be intrigued by the idea.  I'd probably check out the different EQ sites to see if there are guild listings available still (I know I used to go to the Stratics sites a lot for Ultima Online, early EQ, and Asheron's Call, but haven't been there in a year or so).  If there are, check out their charters and send an email to the membership officer to see if any of the members are interested.  That's the best advice I can give you.  Someone else may have other ideas--but either way, good luck!
Cordially,
 
Suzanne Johnson
formerly Aelwesara Cuthalion, ranger of Tunare, Povar server
----- Original Message -----
From: Muriel Hykes <drmom5@...>
To: EQ_women@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, February 13, 2003 7:32 PM
Subject: [EQ_women] Member intro

Hi, I just joined. 

My sons got me started playing.  The two oldest are much higher level
and not on my server.  My character is Leerah on Quellious because
that's where some of my old D&D buddies were.  Level 33 wizard, just
started in October of 2002.  Two of my sons are lower level.  One
doesn't play because of his cerebral palsy.

I am looking for a girlfriend for my 18 yr old son who plays a druid
(57) on Karana.  He has unrealistic expectations for a girlfriend and
I figure he isn't gonna' meet anyone with his nose in the computer all
the time.  He also plays Diablo3.  I bet there are no women on there!

Muriel
www.geocities.com/muriel_drmom
